scripts.clean-install: rm -rf node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml yarn.lock bun.lockb package-lock.json && pnpm install
scripts.clean-install-pmy: rm -rf node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml yarn.lock bun.lockb package-lock.json && yarn
scripts.clean-install-pmb: rm -rf node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml yarn.lock bun.lockb package-lock.json && bun install
scripts.clean-build-pmy: yarn run clean-install-pmy && yarn run build
scripts.clean-build-pmb: bun run clean-install-pmb && bun run build
